1.title: No Voice, No Choice

episode of.title: Cyndi Lauper: Still So Unusual (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: After promising David that she'll be home for dinner, Cyndi tries to get through a very busy day. Will she get it all done in time?

2.title: Derby Day

episode of.title: Cyndi Lauper: Still So Unusual (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Team Lauper goes to the Kentucky Derby. Tensions rise when Cyndi's keyboard is lost, then she drops the f-bomb before a performance... on live TV.

3.title: Cannes She Do It?

episode of.title: Cyndi Lauper: Still So Unusual (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Cyndi performs at Cannes and brings David for some romantic time together. And Rolling Stone Ron Wood might do a song with her, will he show?

4.title: Cyndi's Wild Ride

episode of.title: Cyndi Lauper: Still So Unusual (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Cyndi heads to Coney Island with family and friends for a day of fun. But work is never far away, and she's bombarded by calls about her new dance remix. When she gets stuck in a sea of fans wanting photos, Declyn has had enough.

5.title: Don't Rain on My PSA

episode of.title: Cyndi Lauper: Still So Unusual (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: On a hot summer day in the city, Cyndi shoots a PSA for her True Colors Fund, while the guys play a round of golf. But when things on set don't go as planned, Cyndi loses patience and takes over.

6.title: Dinner for One

episode of.title: Cyndi Lauper: Still So Unusual (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Cyndi heads to Coney Island with her family. But when she gets bombarded by work calls and stuck in a sea of fans, Declyn has had enough.

7.title: Cyndi's Smash Hit

episode of.title: Cyndi Lauper: Still So Unusual (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Cyndi shoots a PSA for her True Colors Fund, while the guys play golf. When things on set don't go as planned, Cyndi loses patience and takes over.

8.title: Ms. Lauper Goes to Washington

episode of.title: Cyndi Lauper: Still So Unusual (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Cyndi heads to Washington D.C. to receive an award for her work with LGBT youth and to tries her hand at lobbying with the political bigwigs.

9.title: These Boots Aren't Made for Dancing

episode of.title: Cyndi Lauper: Still So Unusual (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Cyndi is the Grand Marshall of NY's Gay Pride Parade and will sing at the weekend's biggest event. But mishaps including broken wings get in her way.

10.title: Cyndi's Surprise

episode of.title: Cyndi Lauper: Still So Unusual (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: David is determined to throw Cyndi a surprise birthday party. Declyn is in charge of distracting her. Is nosey Cyndi going to ruin her own surprise?

11.title: From Runway to Broadway

episode of.title: Cyndi Lauper: Still So Unusual (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: Cyndi prepares to perform at Betsey Johnson's Fashion Week show, and the opening of her new musical Kinky Boots. Will the balancing act be too much?

12.title: Cyndi Lauper: A Memoir

episode of.title: Cyndi Lauper: Still So Unusual (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: Cyndi prepares for the release of her memoir, but worries about her family's reaction to the secrets she exposes. Cyndi re-records "Time After Time."

imdb.plot outline: Pop music royalty, passionate philanthropist and super mom, Cyndi Lauper is definitely more than just a girl who wants to have fun. With a successful career that has spanned over three decades, the icon is opening up her unavoidably chaotic, often comical and truly multi-faceted life. Each episode gives viewers an all-access pass into the personal and professional life of one of pop culture's most beloved and influential icons as she juggles her many roles, including rock star, mother, wife, Broadway composer, New York Times best-selling author and philanthropist. Viewers Will be treated to a brand new episode of Cyndi directly following the series premiere at 9:30pm ET/PT on
imdb.title: Cyndi Lauper: Still So Unusual
